addonDescription.message: Helps with reducing markup and CSS for the purposes of generating test cases.

couldNotAccessInspectedNode.message: Could not access inspected node... cross-origin iframe?

errorUnexpectedCSSRule.message: Testcase Reducer found an unexpected CSS rule:

showSameViewportSize.message: Show iframe with original viewport size

invalidSelector.message: Testcase reducer could not match an invalid selector

unclosedBlock.message: Testcase Reducer found an unclosed block in a stylesheet

unclosedComment.message: Testcase Reducer found an unclosed comment in a stylesheet

unclosedPseudo.message: Testcase Reducer found an unterminated pseudo in a stylesheet

unclosedString.message: Testcase Reducer found an unclosed string in a stylesheet

unparseableRule.message: Testcase Reducer found an unparsable rule

noResult.message: No result received. Try running `reduceTestCase($0)` in the console.

checkDevtoolsPanel.message: Results are being sent to the Testcase Reducer devtools panel.
